entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose VectorMask<T> to support generic masking for Vector<T> #74613
  • Update Third-party-notices file in 7.0 installers #74605
    7.0.0
  • NCL stress tests fail to build since ProductVersion update to 8.0.0 #74604
    8.0.0
  • Race condition on marshal-ilgen init #74603
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: `Method X is of low integrity` errors #74596
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'opcode == CEE_LDFLD && objType != nullptr' in 'ReturnTestsType:Return.LocalStructFieldByRef_Invalid_ReturnPtrToStack(Struct):byref:this' during 'Importation' #74593
    7.0.0
  • Native crash in `JIT.Regression` for `mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux x64 release` #74588
  • Support for intrinsics with multiple execution engines with divergent capabilities #74587
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Re-enable passing arguments in SIMD registers #74583
    8.0.0
  • Consider disabling PendingConnectionTimeout if a ConnectTimeout is set #74581
  • source-build TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable don't flow through to the native scripts #74577
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on .NET MAUI Android, but on .NET MAUI Windows and Xamarin.Forms Android #74576
    8.0.0
  • Protection against assembly tampering #74569
  • HttpClient Response Stream hangs #74568
  • JIT: Reconsider setting GTF_GLOB_REF in gtNewFieldRef #74563
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'genTypeSize(fieldNode) == TARGET_POINTER_SIZE' during 'Generate code' #74562
    7.0.0
  • LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator not using incremental generator caching #74557
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\cse\\hugeexpr1\\hugeexpr1.cmd #74555
  • .NET 6 vs .NET 7 reflection performance regression #74550
    7.0.0
  • Int128TestFieldLayout test failing on NativeAOT #74549
    8.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler.AllowAutoRedirect is not working as expected on servers #74548
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary\\muldimjagary.cmd #74541
    7.0.0

Closed

  • MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTest.Contains failed in CI #1429
  • SIMD problems when mixing llvm and non-llvm code #73454
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.ScheduleManyThenDisposeMany has regressed on 64 bit Windows #67972
    7.0.0
  • Usage of memset with non-trivial types that results in -Wclass-memaccess #12684
    Future
  • Unnecessary(?) runtime lookups for constrained interface calls #73681
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #71069
    7.0.0
  • Assertion at /Users/runner/work/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-setup-vtable.c:1007, condition `is_ok (error)' not met, function:apply_override, VAR 1 (V) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations #70190
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests failures #74370
    7.0.0
  • Start time regressions on windows across many TE benchmarks #74315
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51398
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests fail on Android #50575
    Future
  • UTF-8 marshalling of string fields is broken #74394
    7.0.0
  • ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback(checkRevocation: True) failed on macOS 12 with RevocationStatusUnknown #74034
    8.0.0
  • Unable to Copy/Create file on NFS share on macOS #72786
    8.0.0
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #69852
    Future
  • Cannot run tests outside of nativeaot folder #68394
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires11/TimedExpirationAsync #1428
  • Memory corruption (EEE, AV, etc.) with GCStress and blank WF or WPF app #72321
    Future
  • Remove mscorlib references from CoreCLR #7358
    Future
  • Assert failed: System.Net.Http.Http3Connection.SendAsync in coreclr Linux_musl x64 Debug #74162
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][wbt] - Microsoft.Playwright.PlaywrightException : net::ERR_UNSAFE_PORT #72436
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update documentation for analyzing PR failures #74615
    area-Meta
  • For perf, remove Invoker pattern for fields #74614
    area-System.Reflection
  • `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` block Vector types #74612
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption #74611
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix typo in reflection test #74610
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Testing builds with v3beta pool - newer MacOS #74609
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wasm.build.tests for net6, net7 workloads #74608
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Convert SHFileOperation error to Win IO error #74607
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, community-contribution
  • Do not remove certain casts with contained operands #74602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing reducing CI load #74601
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix XmlBinaryReader/XmlBinaryWriter on big-endian systems #74599
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Clean up SuperPMI collection scripts #74598
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Drop 6.0.200 workload manifests #74595
    area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • Remove unneeded references to JsonTypeInfo.PropertyInfoForTypeInfo. #74594
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Show a warning when an explicit package reference to ILCompiler is added #74591
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ensure that the result for PowMod is fully initialized #74585
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • #50870 Enabling Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml tests on android #74575
    os-android, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of EqualsAll for Arm64 with LLVM as backend #74574
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74571
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74570
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • Use System.Numerics.IEqualityOperators.op_Equality in SpanHelper.T.cs where possible. #74567
    area-System.Memory, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74560
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Add custom comparer to use incremental generator caching for LoggerMessageGenerator and JsonSourceGenerator #74558
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • #50878 enable StringSegment tests on Android #74556
    os-android, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Don't crash compilation on invalid UnmanagedCallersOnly #74546
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • use msquic bits on all Windows platforms #74544
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow address == g_gc_highest_address in get_skewed_basic_region_index_for_address #74543
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Re-enable MemoryCacheTest.Contains. #74551
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.0
  • [mini] Disable passing valuetypes in SIMD registers #74582
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Disable ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapledOcsp on NativeAoT #74606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0] [mini] Disable passing valuetypes in SIMD registers #74592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Bump Kerberos.NET version in tests #74600
    area-System.Net.Security
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74539
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0] Allow SIMD-returning calls as arguments #74520
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Improve windows hardware exception handling performance #74590
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add NuGet package for System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema #74597
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #74523
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Only stack allocate when marshalling Utf8 arguments #74553
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable ConnectWithRevocation_ServerCertWithoutContext_NoStapledOcsp on NativeAoT #74561
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Attempt to reduce test build cost #74471
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Enable caching of writeable W^X mappings #74589
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix FormattingHelpers.CountDigits(UInt128) and add more tests for Int128/UInt128.ToString #74536
    area-System.Runtime
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74519
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0] [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74458
    area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Bump Kerberos.NET version in tests #74554
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add NuGet package for System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema #74533
    area-Serialization
  • [release/7.0] Don't re-use XmlSchemaSet - it's not threadsafe. #74564
    area-Serialization, 7.0.0
  • enable SendMailAsync_CanBeCanceled_CancellationToken test #74545
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0] Disable distributed transaction tests on ARM #74573
    area-System.Transactions
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Move all build pools to -Svc equivalents #74521
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Bump branding to RC2 #74515
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Disable distributed transaction tests on ARM #74572
    area-System.Transactions
  • Enable caching of writeable W^X mappings #74526
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Allow AsLPArray test to succeed without COM #74552
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move all the wasm jobs from runtime-staging to runtime #73596
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Switch to unified fully managed Overlapped implementation #74532
    area-System.Threading
  • Add server1.pfx to CredScanSuppressions.json #74559
    area-Infrastructure
  • #50575 colorbehavior default should disable colors in android/applemobile #74496
    os-android, os-ios, area-Extensions-Logging, os-tvos
  • Only stack allocate when marshalling Utf8 arguments #74478
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't re-use XmlSchemaSet - it's not threadsafe. #74524
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Implement proper File System detection for Apple OSes #74493
    area-System.IO
  • Fix building CLR test tree #74547
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] gRPC client tests #73060
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Working with StressLogAnalyzer I found yet another issue where we are… #74491
  • Fix a buffer overrun in GC structures #74540
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove all non-functional/non-informational uses of mscorlib. #74529
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test, and app host fixes #74512
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74379
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fix signature for 64-bit delegate profiling helper #74500
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Collect SPMI for TechEmpower benchmarks #74420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Assertion prop instrumentation #73035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CI: Tighten the path based triggers for jobs #74534
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/6.0] Add signing infrastructure for diagnostic binaries #74330
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Try to make tests faster2 #74530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Non-canonical NaN tests for Vector Equals method (Issue #68710) #74517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Forward-substitute long calls on 32 bit targets #74502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete some unnecessary code #74527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix GUID interop in distributed transactions #74226
    area-System.Transactions, 8.0.0
  • Update fabricbot.json for Tellurium team #74480
    area-Meta
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74516
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Simplify platform macro definitions in PAL #73530
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • Prevent pooled byte buffer writer index from overflowing #74511
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • fix MaxResponseHeadersLength tests #74479
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
